```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

library(googlesheets4)

library(janitor)

sheets_deauth()

```

```{r plot set-up, include = F}

x <- 
  
  read_sheet(
    
    "14HmwN2cEVAJHupuehCuLdwG9BXtR3COrxDgaaylLhkA") %>%
             
  clean_names("snake") %>%
  
  arrange(desc(red)) %>%
  
  mutate(percent_red = red/(red+white))

```

```{r plot, echo= FALSE}

 plot <- 
   
   x %>% 
  
  ggplot(aes(percent_red)) +
  
  geom_bar()
 
 plot

```
